Poding Memorial Library, CYUT
Poding Memorial Library ( Traditional Chinese: 波錠紀念圖書館; Simplified Chinese: 波锭纪念图书馆) is the library at
Chaoyang University of Technology . Established in 1994. The construction of the new library building began on June 1997, and was completed in March 1999.
History
The first class of
Chaoyang University of Technology started in August 1994, and in the same year, the library opened on October 11. It located on the third floor of the University's Teaching Building temporarily served as the library's quarters. It was divided into a periodical and reference room, stacks, and a reading room. Afterward, the collection of library increased so rapidly that it became necessary to add western book stacks and more separate rooms in November 1996 to satisfy the needs of users. After a year of planning, the construction of the new library building began on June 28, 1997, and was completed in March 1999.
